snippet: Two new TV shows about brain power (and moments of weakness) are “The Big Brain Theory: Pure Genius,” on Discovery, and “Brain Games,” on National Geographic.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger compares Discovery Channel competition show The Big Brain Theory: Pure Genius with National Geographic Channel audience participation series Brain Games.
lead_paragraph: Two new TV shows about brain power (and moments of weakness) are “The Big Brain Theory: Pure Genius,” on Discovery, and “Brain Games,” on National Geographic.

headline.print_headline: Gray Matter In Moments Of Triumph And Defeat
headline.main: Gray Matter in Moments of Triumph and Defeat
